message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it's fair to propose a price of $950000 for this exceptional item.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price for such a premium product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on our product, we propose a price of $975000.
I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. I believe this is a fair price for such a premium product.
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We've carefully considered your latest proposal and would like to extend a counteroffer of $950000 for our product.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I was thinking more along the lines of $910000. I believe this is a fair price for such a premium product.
We understand your position, Bob. Our final counteroffer for the product is $935000. We hope this aligns more closely with the value you see in our premium offering.

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not convinced. I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. I believe this is a fair price for such a premium product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway on the last two counteroffers.

Considering your willingness to meet halfway, we are pleased to offer a final price of $925000 for our premium product. We believe this reflects the value you place on it, while also ensuring a fair return for us.

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm willing to go as low as $915000. I believe this is a fair price for such a premium product, and I'm willing to meet you at the table. If you're willing to accept, I'll buy the product from you.
